text:
Oh, Juri,
do you like it?

Haha,
I haven't said anything yet.

Yeah, I like it.
It's like, "So this is how it's going to be".

Haha,
I'm glad to hear that.
This costume is really detailed and beautiful……

Producer thought of so many things
and prepared it for us.

──We have to give a performance
that matches this costume.

──I'm even more fired up now!
Thanks, Producer.
